suggestedTasks.title: Add Error Handling for tmux Session Kill Command
suggestedTasks.description: Implement robust error handling in squad CLI for tmux session termination. Create checks to handle scenarios where the server session might not exist, and provide clear feedback to the user. This will improve reliability and user experience when resetting development servers.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks error management for tmux session killing

suggestedTasks.title: Document tmux Session Management in CLI Readme
suggestedTasks.description: Update project documentation to explain the new 'squad tks' functionality, including its purpose, behavior, and potential side effects. Clearly communicate how this command interacts with tmux server sessions and provides a quick reset mechanism.
suggestedTasks.reason: New CLI feature requires clear documentation for developer understanding

gotchas: Ensure tmux session name is consistent across commands

documentationNeeds: Update squad CLI readme with new 'tks' command description
